entry.title: Brooklyn Museum Publications: Titles with full-text online
entry.content:
Brooklyn Museum books online!

...Youâ€™ve probably noticed that a lot of the content on the Brooklyn Museum website is licensed under a Creative Commons non-commercial attribution license. HathiTrust now offers that option to rights holders. It was a natural for us to jump in and offer pre-1990 Brooklyn Museum and Brooklyn Institute publications under CC terms, too. More recent books will come online gradually, as they go out of print and the stock dwindles (yes, we still want to sell books).  And books that we co-published are going to take some legwork to acquire permission from partners...
 A quick survey of the currently available titles relating to antiquity yields the following:

Predynastic and archaic Egypt in the Brooklyn Museum / by Winifred Needler.


by Brooklyn Museum. Needler, Winifred. Churcher, C. S., 1928-
Published 1984
  • Catalog Record
  • Full view  

Egyptian art in the Brooklyn Museum collection.


by Brooklyn Museum.
Published 1952
  • Catalog Record
  • Full view

Ancient Egyptian glass and glazes in the Brooklyn Museum / Elizabeth Riefstahl.


by Brooklyn Museum. Dept. of Ancient Art. Riefstahl, Elizabeth.
Published 1968
  • Catalog Record
  • Full view  

Southeast Asian ceramics : [Published for the exhibition, the Brooklyn Museum, Oriental Art Special Exhibition Gallery, May 7-August 31, 1975] / Robert Moes.


by Moes, Robert. Brooklyn Museum
Published 1975
  • Catalog Record
  • Full view  

Five years of collecting Egyptian art, 1951-1956 : catalogue of an exhibition held at the Brooklyn Museum, 11 December, 1956 to 17 March, 1957.


by Brooklyn Museum.
Published 1956
  • Catalog Record
  • Full view  

Brief guide to the Department of Ancient Art.


by Brooklyn Museum. Dept. of Ancient Art.
Published 1970
  • Catalog Record
  • Full view  

Late Egyptian and Coptic art, an introduction to the collections in the Brooklyn Museum.


by Brooklyn Museum. Cooney, John Ducey.
Published 1943
  • Catalog Record
  • Full view

by Brooklyn Museum. Pomerance, Leon.
Published 1966
  • Catalog Record

by Brooklyn Museum. Riefstahl, Elizabeth. Wilbour, Charles Edwin
Published 1943

by Brooklyn Museum.

by Riefstahl, Elizabeth. Brooklyn Museum.

Ancient art of the Americas.


by Powell, Jane P. Brooklyn Museum.

by Poster, Amy G., 1946- Brooklyn Museum.

by Noveck, Madeline Gorelick, Leonard. Brooklyn Museum.
Published 1975
  • Catalog Record
  • (view record to see multiple volumes) 

Glass and glazes from ancient Egypt.


by Brooklyn Museum. Riefstahl, Elizabeth.
Published 1948

by Wilbour, Charles E. 1833-1896. Capart, Jean. Brooklyn Museum.
Published 1936

Coptic Egypt;


by New York University. Brooklyn Museum.

 And see also: Brooklyn Museum Image Collections
